LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.IsNoRegisted
LocaleResource.Value: Unregistered version, plugin has 15 days trial period.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.IsExpired
LocaleResource.Value: Your license has expired, you should renew the license with a 50% discount.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.Settings.showDebugInfo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Write debugging information into file. In ~/App_Data/ folder.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.Settings.UseGoogleEnhancedEcommerce.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable this paramater if nopcommerce uses the plugin "Google Enhanced Ecommerce".

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.Settings.MerchantId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This GTM 'Merchant Id' (G-XXXXXX) uses for mapping token '@MerchantId'.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.Settings.GoogleId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter Google Analytics ID (UA-XXXXXX-X). Plugin will use it if customer uses ADBlock or another utility to block Google Analitics/Google Tag Manager scripts.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.Settings.GoogleId.Comment
LocaleResource.Value: If customer uses ADBlock or another utility to block Google Analitics/Google Tag Manager scripts than plugin will send fire in backgroud mode using Measurement Protocol into Google Analitics at once.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.Settings.IncludingTax.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to include tax when generating tracking code for order items.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.Settings.SupportMultiCurrency.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: By default plugin uses the primary currency of store, but you can enable using the customer's currency for each order.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.Settings.RevenueAmount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select value for Revenue parameter on (Purchase event on order completed page).

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.Settings.UseStoreNameAsAffiliate
LocaleResource.Value: Use the name of store for parameter 'affiliate'

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.Settings.UseStoreNameAsAffiliate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Use the name of store for parameter 'affiliate'. By default plugin uses affiliate ID for parameter 'affiliate'.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.GoogleAnalytics4.Settings.TransactionKey.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select from the list what key you want to use as unique transaction key for your orders, nopcommerce order ID or order number.
